author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-508: make sure SegmentTermEnum.prev() is accurate (= last term) after next() returns false

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-686] fix stop logic to avoid deadlocks, and 100% cpu use spin loop waiting for resource.  Also- fix logging in ProcessingUnit to make the code more readable, and shrink it by about a 1/3.

author: cziegeler
msg: Move configuration of profile loading and saving to profile store; use new bean ProfileKey instead of Object for specifying the profile to load/save and directly access profiles instead of going through the sitemap.

author: pcl
msg: Write output to the logging channels instead of to stdout.
